summary: Contains 2 (more in near future) Auras that will boost/enhance your fighting experience. Currently there is an Aura of Vamprism and an Aura of Spellpoints. These will add 10% of the enemys health to your HP/SP.
descriptionHtml:
---Triplus Aura Mod---
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
-Aura of Vamprism: 10% of the enemy\'s health is added your own health (on death).
-Aura of Spellpoints: 10% of the enemy\'s health is added your own magicka (on death).
- (WIP) Aura of Protection
- (WIP) Aura of True Shot
-
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
The Court Wizard of the Falmer once found an artifact, believed to be worthless. When he gave it to on of this apprentices, a bond was created. The wizard evaporated and the knowledge of his apprentice grew fast.
Not telling them the curse placed upon the first finder, the new Wizard sent his Apprentices to look for the Remaining Auras, making them undead ans cursed until the can pass the Aura to someone else. These women, Legion, are still looking for their freedom...
-Scrolls of Legion
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
This MOD is still in early development, please say what you like/don\'t like in the comments!
-Use gloves while wearing the Aura, i\'m having some trouble with invisble hands, i\'m sorry, going to fix it! (FIXED)
-Got some messed-up dialogue, trying to fix it...
-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-
!!!!!!SPOILERS BELOW!!!!!!
To go to the testcell type \'coc TripAuraTest\'
First Legion can be found wandering around Whiterun (Vamprism)
Second Legion can found wandering around Solitude (Spellpoints)
author: Triplus

files.name: TripAura_B2
